mapper.update: UPDATE t_link SET enable_status = 1 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND short_uri = #{shortUri} AND enable_status = 0 AND del_flag = 0
UPDATE t_link SET del_flag = 1 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND short_uri = #{shortUri} AND enable_status = 1 AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT a.gid, domain, a.short_uri as shortUri, full_short_url AS fullShortUrl, origin_url AS originUrl, COUNT(CASE WHEN pv > 0 THEN 1 END) AS pv, COUNT(CASE WHEN uv > 0 THEN 1 END) AS uv, COUNT(CASE WHEN uip > 0 THEN 1 END) AS uip, icon as icon, title as title, valid_type AS validType, valid_time AS validTime FROM t_link a left JOIN t_link_stats b ON a.short_uri = b.short_uri WHERE a.enable_status = 0 AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.gid = #{gid} GROUP BY shortUri
SELECT origin_url FROM t_link WHERE short_uri = #{shortUri} AND gid = #{gid}
SELECT gid FROM t_link WHERE short_uri = #{shortUri}
SELECT * FROM t_link WHERE enable_status = 1 AND del_flag = 0
SELECT gid, short_uri AS shortUri, ip, pv, uv, uip, os, browser, province, city, `date`, `hour`, `week` FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{short_url}

SELECT `hour`, COUNT(*) AS cnt, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / (SELECT SUM(cnt) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `hour` is not NULL GROUP BY ip ) t), 2) AS ratio FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `hour` is not NULL GROUP BY hour ORDER BY cnt DESC;

SELECT `week` AS day, COUNT(*) AS cnt, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / (SELECT SUM(cnt) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `week` is not NULL GROUP BY ip ) t), 2) AS ratio FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `week` is not NULL GROUP BY `week` ORDER BY cnt DESC;

SELECT CONCAT(os,' 系统') AS os, COUNT(*) AS cnt, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / (SELECT SUM(cnt) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `os` is not NULL GROUP BY ip ) t), 2) AS ratio FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `os` is not NULL GROUP BY `os` ORDER BY cnt DESC;

SELECT CONCAT(browser, ' 浏览器') AS browser, COUNT(*) AS cnt, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / (SELECT SUM(cnt) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and browser is not NULL GROUP BY ip ) t), 2) AS ratio FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and browser is not NULL GROUP BY browser ORDER BY cnt DESC;

SELECT `week` as id, COUNT(CASE WHEN pv > 0 THEN 1 END) AS pv, COUNT(CASE WHEN uip > 0 THEN 1 END) AS uip FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `week` is not NULL GROUP BY week ORDER BY `week` ASC;

SELECT `hour` as id, COUNT(CASE WHEN pv > 0 THEN 1 END) AS pv, COUNT(CASE WHEN uip > 0 THEN 1 END) AS uip FROM t_link_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUrl} and `hour` is not NULL GROUP BY hour ORDER BY `hour` ASC;
SELECT create_time from t_link WHERE gid = #{gid} and short_uri = #{shortUrl} and enable_status = 0;
